con:call.name: Request 1

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.v6.v3.Common" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr3="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:ModifyHierarchyRole>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>?</acr:MerchantId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr:Password>?</acr:Password>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr:UserId>?</acr:UserId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:GeoLocationInformation>?</acr2:GeoLocationInformation>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:IMEI>?</acr2:IMEI>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr2:HierarchyRole>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr3:HierarchyRoleId>?</acr3:HierarchyRoleId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr3:InvoiceOption>?</acr3:InvoiceOption>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr3:Name>?</acr3:Name>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr3:ParameterList>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <acr3:HierarchyRoleParameter>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr3:Name>?</acr3:Name>\r <acr3:Option>?</acr3:Option>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr3:SendEmailAlert>?</acr3:SendEmailAlert>\r <acr3:TriggerAmount>?</acr3:TriggerAmount>\r </acr3:HierarchyRoleParameter>\r </acr3:ParameterList>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr3:PrivilegeList>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <acr3:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr3:Name>?</acr3:Name>\r </acr3:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r </acr3:PrivilegeList>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr3:ReceiptType>?</acr3:ReceiptType>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr3:RoleId>?</acr3:RoleId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <acr3:RoleLevel>?</acr3:RoleLevel>\r </acr2:HierarchyRole>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:ModifyHierarchyRole>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
